nodes.bodyText: minor nit: first time I read the code, the name Factory implied to me that new instances would be returned for each call, since this is providing singletons (memoized instances), maybe rename this class to ...Provider, or ...Holder?
Since these are now centrally managed, would be nice to have gauges that show their current size.
you can drop this TODO, I wanted to use jackson instead of gson to get support for immutable POJOs, but it's not worth the effort
probably safe to remove this try catch now and the return null below
